name: Pav Bhaji
description: A popular street food consisting of spiced vegetable mash served with buttered bread rolls.

name: Vada Pav
description: A Mumbai street food staple, featuring a spiced potato fritter sandwiched between a bread roll.

name: Puran Poli
description: A sweet flatbread stuffed with a mixture of jaggery and lentils, typically served during festivals.

name: Misal Pav
description: A spicy curry made from sprouted lentils, topped with farsan, and served with bread rolls.

name: Shrikhand
description: A sweet dish made from strained yogurt flavored with saffron and cardamom.
